definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: region across, beyond (v. BH 1. [[עֵ֫בֶר]] √[[עָבַר]]);—cstr. in phr. [[נַהֲרָה]]([[־]])[[עֲבַר]], i.e. Syria (Scheft:87): Ezr 4:10, Ezr 4:11, Ezr 4:17, Ezr 4:20, Ezr 5:3, Ezr 5:6, Ezr 5:6, Ezr 6:6, Ezr 6:6, Ezr 6:8, Ezr 6:13, Ezr 7:21, Ezr 7:25, [[נהרא]] ´[[ע]]: Ezr 4:16. Cf. in Cilic. Aram., Cooke:346.
